result.trip_overview_narrative: Leipzig International School offers experiential learning opportunities including field trips, visits from community members, and forest walks primarily at the Kindergarten level to encourage natural curiosity and individual development.

evidence.quote: Through experiential learning with field trips, visits from community members or forest walks we encourage natural curiosity and enable individual development...

unknowns: Details on trips for grades beyond Kindergarten
